title: NYC Marathon Is Named a ‘Safe Space’ by The Stonewall Inn
dc:creator: Kris Rhim

media:content.media:credit: Chang W. Lee/The New York Times
media:content.media:description: The Stonewall Inn, a gay bar in Greenwich Village and the site of the Stonewall riots of 1969, has named the N.Y.C. marathon a “safe space.”
